Interface IArticleTagRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing the many-to-many relationship between Article and Tag entities. Handles tag associations, bulk operations, removal, and usage statistics for articles.

public interface IArticleTagRepository : IRepository<ArticleTag>
Inherited Members

IRepository<ArticleTag>.InsertOrUpdateAsync(ArticleTag, CancellationToken)
IRepository<ArticleTag>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<ArticleTag>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<ArticleTag>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<ArticleTag>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<ArticleTag>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This repository manages the join table ArticleTag, which stores metadata about when and how a tag was applied to an article (e.g., manually by user, automatically by rule, confidence score from ML, etc.).

Core responsibilities:

  • Association and disassociation of tags to/from articles (single and bulk)
  • Existence checks and targeted retrieval by article or tag
  • Bulk cleanup (remove all tags from article or tag from all articles)
  • Retrieval of tags with full details or article IDs by tag name
  • Statistics and audit-like queries (recently applied, by rule)

Important behavioral expectations:

  • All write operations should be atomic and preferably transactional.
  • Duplicate associations are prevented (unique constraint on ArticleId + TagId).
  • Metadata fields (AppliedBy, RuleId, Confidence) are optional but tracked for auditability and future ML/rule improvements.
  • Removal operations do not cascade to delete tags themselves — only the join record.
  • Queries involving tag names may involve joins to the Tag table.

Methods

AssociateTagWithArticleAsync(int, int, string, int?, double?, CancellationToken)

Associates a single tag with an article, including optional metadata.

Task<bool> AssociateTagWithArticleAsync(int articleId, int tagId, string appliedBy = "user", int? ruleId = null, double? confidence = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

articleId int

ID of the article.

tagId int

ID of the tag to apply.

appliedBy string

Source of the tag ("user", "rule", "ml", etc.). Default: "user".

ruleId int?

ID of the rule that applied the tag (null if manual).

confidence double?

Confidence score (0.0–1.0) if ML-applied; null otherwise.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<bool>

true if the association was created; false if already existed.

AssociateTagsWithArticleAsync(int, IEnumerable<int>, string, int?, CancellationToken)

Associates multiple tags with an article in a single operation.

Task<int> AssociateTagsWithArticleAsync(int articleId, IEnumerable<int> tagIds, string appliedBy = "user", int? ruleId = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

articleId int

Article ID.

tagIds IEnumerable<int>

Collection of tag IDs to apply.

appliedBy string

Source ("user", "rule", etc.).

ruleId int?

Rule ID if applied by automation (optional).

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

Number of new associations created.
